title: AI Series A investor update template
summary: Projected update format for AI founders raising a Series A round. Includes structured sections, KPIs, and asks to keep investors aligned.

sections.content: Summarize the most meaningful wins since the last update.
Share the handful of metrics that show momentum and retention.
List major product milestones and what they unlock next.
Explain pipeline progress and conversion velocity.
Ask for specific customer intros or domain expertise.
Share evaluation results and cost efficiency gains.
Summarize the milestone progress expected for AI founders at Series A.
